article_title: Mercy opens renovated and expanded emergency department

article_metadata.description: Mercy Medical Center sees 68,000 patients a year in the emergency room. The hospital recently renovated and expanded the emergency department (ED), in part to increase its capacity to serve 80,000 patients yearly.
article_metadata.author: Patricia Faulhaber The Suburbanite
